text: Lipova may refer to several places: ==Czech Republic== * Lipová (Děčín District), village in Děčín District * Lipová (Cheb District), village in Cheb District * Lipová (Prostějov District), village in Prostějov District * Lipová (Přerov District), village in Přerov District * Lipová (Zlín District), village in Zlín District * Lipová-lázně, village in Jeseník District ==Romania== *Lipova, Arad, a town in Arad County *Lipova, Bacău, a commune in Bacău County *Lipova (river), a tributary of the Tutova in Bacău and Vaslui Counties ==Slovakia== *Lipová, Nitra Region, a village and municipality in the Nitra Region *Lipová, Prešov Region, a village and municipality in the Prešov Region == Serbia == * Lipova (Vrnjačka Banja) == See also == * Lippa (disambiguation)
title: Lipova
